LightningComponentBundle.description: An accessible accordion component that displays FAQ questions and answers, with 3 sections where each section has a question header and answer body. The first section is expanded by default, and chevron icons rotate on expand/collapse.

property.name: allowMultiple
property.label: Allow Multiple Sections Open
property.description: When true, allows multiple sections to be expanded at the same time

property.name: allowCollapse
property.label: Allow All Sections to Collapse
property.description: When true, allows all sections to be collapsed at once

property.name: sections
property.label: FAQ Sections (JSON)
property.description: Optional JSON array of section objects with 'question' and 'answer' properties. Example: [{'question':'How do I reset my password?','answer':'Click Forgot Password'}]
